name: Spectrum (itch) (raf.pelegrina)
description:
Once upon a time . . .

An evil wizard, jealous of the world's beauty, decided to steal all the colors away and lock them up in chests across the lands. The world is left bleak, and gray . . . until a young boy named Alex decides to take a stand. 

Play Alex and battle the wizard's cute minions to collect the colors and bring back colors to the world!
